channel.title: Always wondered
channel.description:
[code]Magax Destroyer: Gives you unlimited health and has an exit button
Meerca Chase II: This trainer will stop the tail from growing
Turmac Roll: This trainer will make your score increase very quickly
Deckswabber: Removes the badguys, unclick the button badguys after finishing a level to turn the badguys back on
Extreme Herder:his trainer will make you invincible to Balthazar, unclick the Balthazar button to return the game to normal.
Pet Pet Rescue(no avatar): Gives you unlimited health and has an exit button
Raiders of Maraqua: Gives you unlimited health and has an exit button
Ultimate Bullseye: Gives you unlimited shots and has an exit button
Maths Nightmare: Gives you mega score
VolcanoRun: This trainer will make you invincible
Korbat's Lab Autoplayer: The auto player will play Korbats Lab for you, the only thing you have to do is press a button between rounds
Word Poker: To use this cheat: Enter any words, at least two and press the flush option in the game and just keep pressing to keep adding to score
Extreme Potato Counter: This trainer will give you a running count of the flying potatoes and ignore all other vegetables
Castle of Eliv Thade: This trainer will tell you the unscrambled word, all you have to do is enter the word in the answer box.
Snow Wars II: This trainer will give you unlimited time while playing Snow Wars II. To use press the set timer to unlimited button when you want the timer maxed and use the set timer to normal button to play as normal.
Mynci Volleball: This trainer removes the second mynci
Evil Fuzzles II: This trainer will give you max gun value and max hull integrity.
PterattackII: This trainer will allow you to choose startng gun type and unlimited lives.
Escape From Meridell Castle: This trainer will give you max flight time and unlimited lives.
FlyCatcherII: This trainer will give you unlimited lives.
Tug O War Ap: This AutoPlayer will play Tug O War for you.
Meepit vs Feepit: This trainer will never let player 2 count a win.
Igloo Garage Sale: This trainer will allow you to pick the items off the ground.
Skies over Meridell: This trainer will give you unlimited lives.
Feed Florg: This trainer wil give you unlimited drops.
Hubrids Hero Heist: This trainer auto casts for you.
Bumper Cars: This trainer allows unlimited damage.
Advert Attack: This trainer will stop the computer ship and all popups.
Typing Terror: This autoplayer will auto type for you and allow you to set the amt of grundos per round (15 limit in public version).
Whack A Ghost: This autoplayer will auto whack the ghosts as they appear.
Faerie Bubbles: This trainer will finish the level in one click allowing for the full bonus.
Defender Trainer: This trainer will tell you what box is correct and stop the timer, select hard win playing.
Jubble Bubble: This trainer will give you endless lives.
ToyBox Escape: This trainer will give you endless lives.
Dubloon Disaster: This trainer will stop the bombs from appearing and the coin will not move. Please make sure you allow one bombe to appear before starting this trainer.
200 Meter Peanut Dash: This trainer will launch the peanut at full force. [/code]
When someone posts something like this, im guessing its some kind of code for shit but what program do you need to use it?
Yep, im new to this...

item.title: Always wondered
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:4, topic:11584”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=17221.msg195428#msg195428 date=1156877296]
… This forum is causing me to loose the little bit of intellegence i had
[/quote]
No, that’s long gone.[/quote]

ilyaostr ate it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mmmk wrote:

That isnt a code… and its usually a scar script or java

Read full topic
